title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 40.20 - Quorum and vote majority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 40.20 - Quorum and vote majority

State Regulations
A simple majority of the advisory board members shall be
necessary to constitute a quorum. A simple voting majority present shall be
required to pass any motion or approve any advisory board action. At assembled
meetings all votes shall be cast in person. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
40.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
